Tax.effect: Gain 1 Gold per Unit you control.

Plan Ahead.effect: Pick a Card from your Deck. Put that Card on top of your Deck. You draw 1 less Card at the end of your turn.

Quick Draw.effect: Draw 2 Cards. Skip your next Turn.

Sniper.effect: Use any Card in your Deck that deals Damage.

Copycat.effect: Use 1 copy of the Card most previously Played by a target Unit.

Advantage.effect: Draw 1 Card. Instantly Play it without paying its Cost. If you cannot Play the Card, Discard it.

Toll Fee.effect: Add 1 Card from your Deck to your Hand.

Recycle.effect: Add 1 Card from your Discard pile to your Hand.

Arcane Trickery.effect: Gain 3 Mana. You Draw 1 less Card at the end of your turn.

Focus Energy.effect: Gain 5 Mana until the end of your turn.

Finders Keepers.reward: Add 3 Cards from your Discard pile to your Hand.

Rapid Fire.effect: When you use a Card that deals Damage, you may use another Card that deals Damage. You may only use this effect once per Turn.

Rattle Bones.effect: Deal 2 Damage extra for every 3 Cards in your Discard pile.

Energy Convertor.effect: Pay any amount of Power, gain 3x as much Mana.

I'm Alive.effect: Return all of your Banished Cards to your Discard pile.

Subvert.effect: Banish all Cards in your Discard pile. Gain 1 Resource (split however you wish) for every 2 Cards you Banish using this Card’s effect.

Death and Decay.effect: Roll a 6-sided dice. Discard that many Cards from the top of your Deck and gain that many Resources (split however you wish).

Recruit.reward: Summon a Unit. Place it on this Ritual.

Deal with the Devil.effect: Discard your Hand. Summon two Units.

Deny.effect: Next time the targeted unit Plays a card that uses Mana, cancel that effect.

Lightning Strike.effect: Roll a 6-sided dice, add what you rolled to your Damage.

Aim for the weakspot.effect: Deal Physical Damage equal to half of a Unit’s current Health.

Mind Control.effect: Target enemy unit acts as your unit this turn.

Death Toll.effect: Use a Card from your Discard pile without paying for its Cost.

Rite of Midas.effect: Banish a Card from your Hand. Gain Gold equals to that Card’s Resource cost.

Electromagnetic Pulse.effect: Splash. All units Damaged cannot Play Cards that require Mana during your opponent’s next turn.

Mind Flay.effect: Deal damage to a Unit equal to their Power.

Weaken.effect: Reduce the target Unit's Power by 2.

Teleport.effect: Place this Unit on any Tile.

Future Sight.effect: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Pick one and add it to your hand, then shuffle the rest into your deck.

Dash.effect: Double the targeted Unit's Speed this turn.

Reality Rift.effect: Swap this Unit's position with another Unit's position.

Laser.effect: 3 Charges. Deals Damage to all Units and Buildings in a line between the targeted Unit or Building and the casting Unit.

Breed.effect:
If there is a friendly Unit adjacent to the casting Unit and they are within friendly Territory, Summon a Unit. 
The other unit cannot Play or have Played a Card this turn.

Magnetize.effect: Splash 2. You can place any affected Unit anywhere else within the target radius.

Gathering Mind.effect: Add an Elemental Spell Card from your deck to your hand.

Portal.effect: Put a Mark on the casting Unit’s feet, and on the targeted Tile. If a Unit steps onto a Mark, they are put on the other Mark.

Holster.effect: This Units Physical weapons have +1 maximum Charge.
